text: The 1957–58 Idaho Vandals men's basketball team represented the University of Idaho during the 1957–58 NCAA University Division basketball season. Members of the Pacific Coast Conference, the Vandals were led by fourth-year head coach Harlan Hodges and played their home games on campus at Memorial Gymnasium in Moscow, Idaho. The Vandals were overall and in conference play in the penultimate season of the PCC. Senior guard Gary Simmons of Twin Falls was the UI's first All-American. ==References== ==External links== *Sports Reference – Idaho Vandals: 1957–58 basketball season *Gem of the Mountains: 1958 University of Idaho yearbook – 1957–58 basketball season *Idaho Argonaut – student newspaper – 1958 editions Category:Idaho Vandals men's basketball seasons Idaho Idaho
